header.subtitle: Discover the hidden sights of Seoul with our AI-based tourism recommendation service
header.explain: From weather forecasts, tourist sites, hot spots, to tour course recommendations! Experience a variety of information related to tourism after searching your current location.

content.subtitle1: The service is provided based on your current or desired location.
content.subtitle3: Click on a hotspot to see more detailed tourist information!
content.subtitle4: Multiple filters available - click on a marker to see more details!
content.subtitle5: Select a course and we will recommend a tour course around your location!
content.sel1: Please select the number of places
content.sel2: Please select the desired category (multiple selections possible)
